description: SQLAlchemy models for TicTacToe game state persistence, including classes for Game, GameMove, and GameStats with associated attributes, relationships, and indexes.

classes.name: Game
classes.description: Model for storing game state and metadata, including attributes like id, board_state, difficulty, current_player, status, winner, outcome, timestamps, and relationship to moves.

classes.name: GameMove
classes.description: Model for storing individual moves with attributes like id, game_id, position, player, timestamp, and relationship to parent game.

classes.name: GameStats
classes.description: Model for storing game statistics per difficulty level, including wins, losses, draws, total_moves, and timestamps.

methods.name: __repr__
methods.description: String representation methods for Game and GameMove models.
